html:
11.26.18  3:05 pm   what was your favorite song to make, write, sing, and record?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favotire

11.26.18  12:12 pm   did u really think there was no way you could do this fuckin vine thing or did you just say that

     it felt that way, because i had already come so far on other mediums and platforms that it felt strange to be starting a brand new one. it always feels that way to start something new

11.26.18  12:03 pm   What's the best thing in Belgium?

     i don't know but i have heard their pancakes are pretty good

11.26.18  11:24 am   do you try to make your content timeless?

     of course. but that is somewhat of a tall order

11.26.18  10:51 am   Do you ever compare your achievements to other people's achievements?

     sometimes

11.26.18  10:49 am   Do you think you're an overall organized person?

     yes but no, and yes

11.26.18  9:43 am   Do you enjoy making your videos?

     yes

      Why? 

     i can make them any way i like. so if i'm not enjoying it i can do it another way until i find an enjoyable way. that's the manufacturer's guarantee

11.26.18  9:03 am   Is the new song going to be soon? (by soon I mean before 2019)

     according to my calculations there will be 3 more songs released before 2019

11.26.18  8:59 am   How come songs like When I Get Older and Hello Sexy Pants are on Napster but songs like We Could Just Get High and I Wanna be a Movie Star aren't?

     i think napster didn't exist when those were released

11.26.18  8:28 am   What is your opinion on dodecahedrons? 

     they are one of the most popular hedrons

11.26.18  7:53 am   What are some secret pages on this site?

     the whole site is a secret

11.26.18  4:34 am   What would you rate this question?

     fair

11.26.18  2:58 am   is there hope for me to become as passionate and dedicated as you are?

     if that's what you want, then it has already happened

11.26.18  2:14 am   Will you ever release merch?

     i have done that. hopefully there is some left

      I'd love to have a tshirt with your YouTube icon.

     there should be some of those in there

      Also, a friend wants to know if we could get some of your sheet music. 

     not yet

11.26.18  1:12 am   Would you like to be a teacher at a place that teaches people

     everywhere teaches people

11.26.18  12:47 am   thoughts on pears

     sometimes i like to have just 1

11.26.18  12:40 am   should i appreciate cows more

     that depends how much you currently appreciate them

11.26.18  12:09 am   have you ever used a chord in a song that you'd never heard before in any other song? which one?​

     the roaring sound at the beginning of 'i'm a diamond'

11.25.18  11:34 pm   A friend of mine describes creativity as like "catching a wave - once you're on it, you're on it, and you're not gonna sleep on it." Do you view creativity this way,

     sure

      or can it perhaps be forced?

     that would be convenient

      I feel like my problem is that I have all the skills but I don't use them often enough to build a "music career", if that makes sense.

11.25.18  10:28 pm   what is your favorite page on your website?

     questions

11.25.18  9:48 pm   how do you know the moon is made of cheese if you can't taste it?

     the moon is not made of cheese, it's made of sheep

11.25.18  9:21 pm   do you listen to your own songs when you're doing random things or cleaning the house etc? i think i'd do that if i were someone like you

     no time for anything other than making new songs, which i listen to while i am making them but not after. or maybe just once after, just to double check that it got made

11.25.18  9:19 pm   how do you feel about tennis, bill?

     no one seems to want the ball

11.25.18  8:54 pm   Should I be a philosopher?

     by the time you decide it will be too late

11.25.18  8:47 pm   Why so many people like you?

     i am an influencer, and thus have influenced them into liking me

11.25.18  8:00 pm   Why don't you try replacing some text with wingdings in an upcoming video?

     i don't have wingdings but i have another font that you may like, it is used at the end of the mt. st. helens song, and i think in the bridge of 'outside'

11.25.18  7:58 pm   how big is the sun?

     i'd say it's a pretty good size

11.25.18  6:58 pm   What is your interpretation of hell? And heaven? 

     dramaticized versions of life on earth as we know it

11.25.18  6:49 pm   What are you center of interest other than music?

     communication

11.25.18  6:48 pm   What do you think about rationalizing? 

     you'd think everything would be rationalized already. there must be some hidden de-rationalization at play

11.25.18  6:39 pm   what is your opinion on geese? 

     they know how to spend their time. very good time spenders, that's what i say

11.25.18  5:50 pm   Is anything real?

     sure

11.25.18  5:43 pm   Do more covers please 

     i am ready to do them immediately. but i have discovered that the logistics of publishing them is more complicated than i thought, if i wanna do it with a video

11.25.18  5:33 pm   Do you like any sports? or at least watch some sports?

     i am sports

11.25.18  5:30 pm   Are there grander and thematic messages encrypted in your songs/video which go further than simple interpretation of lyrics/visuals?

     it's meant to go with the music. best interpretation is probably gonna be lyric+music together. and then the visual would be my best attempt at interpreting the lyric+music

11.25.18  3:42 pm   is this reality the reflect of another one?

     yes, and so much more

11.25.18  3:36 pm   why can't we see what you did in "y2k or whatever" on the bottom of the expert page?

     because i did not post it. i'm not entirely sure what i was doing. maybe coloring garfield books on the computer i guess

11.25.18  2:33 pm   any plans for some unconventional/non-music projects in the near future?

     yes and no, but yes

11.25.18  2:32 pm   how/where do i start become musically literate?

     you could start with the pithces or the rhythms ...... i am biased toward starting with the rhythms because i started much much much much earlier with the rhythms. take 3 of your favorite songs. find the click. 'click' is a studio term for the beat of the song. it's what you would tap your foot to. i would say that would be your first exercise, which you may have aced long ago but i have no way of knowing how far along you are. my next suggestion is to see if you can hear them in groups of 4, throughout the song. most songs work like that .....

11.25.18  2:16 pm   is a little wrist ache normal after playing the keyboard for 1.5-2 hours or am i doing something wrong? 

     maybe slightly

11.25.18  2:14 pm   Do you have moments that you feel "burned out" for music? That you just don't feel like making any music at all?

     not even close

11.25.18  2:06 pm   I've heard of that anyone good at music should be able to hear the thing when he reads the sheet music, or before playing it out etc.. I wonder how to develop this kind of skill(my listening skills are extremely poor by the way, and if I try imagine the shape of music beforehand, either it's wrong or worse, only blankness) I think i'm a bit slow at this. Although I started learning piano at quite a young age, but since it's a keyboard instrument so all you have to do is use your eyes doing some sheet reading then press the keys, and since no one is there to tell me to pay attention to what you hear, until now i'm still lost when all the people there say the only right way to music is to use ear...

     if you want to compose / make up / invent what you are playing, then you'll probably want those hearing skills. but reading someone's exact transcription is a whole different way to experience music. very cool

11.25.18  2:04 pm   would you rather be a dragon or have a dragon?

     both, or neither

11.25.18  1:34 pm   What is the outside world?

     it turns out to be a very close cousin and sister to the inside world

11.25.18  12:56 pm   do you think that your music can be defined in some kind of music?

     that's probably the only way to define music. with music

11.25.18  12:36 pm   are any of your songs based on dreams

     occasionally they get written in dreams

11.25.18  11:30 am   how to live under a rock?

     it's better to live next to a rock

11.25.18  12:28 pm   Do you think there's any meaning in your songs?

     yes

      Or is it just what people interpret it as?

     just? that would include everything. anyone's interpretation ever. yes, all that

      Do you see your songs as representing any particular identity or is identity not important? Many thanks :) 

     i suppose it would be useful to remember the artist name so as to know where to find the music, as new songs come out

11.25.18  11:01 am   do you like puzzles?

     yes

11.25.18  10:07 am   whats your favorute song of yours?
i like i can play

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite
